articles.author: SAM METZ
articles.title: US military defends Africa strategy in light of coups and a drift toward Russia - The Associated Press
articles.description: The head of the United States military’s Africa Command is pushing back against Russia's efforts to broaden its influence in Africa, blaming the country's disinformation efforts for the spate of military coups that has swept the region in recent years. In an …
articles.content: AGADIR, Morocco (AP) The head of the U.S. military in Africa vigorously defended the countrys counterterrorism strategy on the continent and vowed to press forward with it despite a wave of criticism… [+4459 chars]

articles.author: GERALD IMRAY, MOGOMOTSI MAGOME
articles.title: South Africa election: Early results ruling ANC short of a majority - The Associated Press
articles.description: Partial results in South Africa’s national election have put the long-ruling African National Congress at less than 50% of the vote. It raises the possibility that it might lose its majority for the first time since it swept to power under Nelson Mandela at t…
articles.content: JOHANNESBURG (AP) Partial results in South Africas national election put the long-ruling African National Congress party at well below 50% of the vote as counting continued Thursday, and it could be … [+6704 chars]
